definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: leap ( NH spring over, skip (a verse), omit)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[דּוֹלֵג]] Zep 1:9 leap, c. art. one leaping [[על־הַמִּפְתָּן]]; LXX 1Sa 5:5 u(perbai/nontev u(perbai/nousi/ = [[דָּלֽג יִדְלָֽגוּ]] cf. Dr.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְדַלֵּג]] Is 35:6; [[אֲדַלֶּג־]] Ps 18:30 = 2Sa 22:30; Pt. [[מְדַלֵּג]] Ct So 2:8; —leap, leap over c. acc. [[שׁוּר]] Ps 18:30 = 2Sa 22:30; abs. leap as the stag, [[כָּאַיׇּל פִּסֵּחַ]] ´[[יְד]] Is 35:6; sq. [[על]] of locality Ct So 2:8 (‖[[מְקַפֵּץ]]).
